control.description-key: Upload multiple files as attachments new version

property.name: fileData
property.description-key: Data for the files to be uploaded

property.name: isUploading
property.description-key: Whether the files are currently being uploaded

property.name: blockedFileExtension
property.description-key: List of blocked file extensions (comma separated)

property.name: maxFileSizeForAttachment
property.description-key: Maximum file size allowed for attachment (in bytes)

property.name: parentEntityName
property.description-key: Logical name of the parent entity to associate notes with

property.name: parentRecordId
property.description-key: GUID of the parent entity record to associate notes with

property.name: showDialog
property.description-key: Output property to trigger a dialog with a title and message
